lines.text: Your monstrous ugliness breeds monstrous hatred. Good! I can use your hate.
I'll pay you any amount of money, Dr. Vollin,
But someone is dying! your obligation as a member of the medical profession...
I respect no obligation. I am a law unto himself!
But you have no human feeling? My daughter is dying!
Death hasn't the same significance for me as it has for you.
Torture waiting... waiting. It will be sweet, Judge Thatcher!
